q: is no poetry in Known and Unknown. Donald Rumsfeld seems to be experimenting with a new-ish genre very popular with political folk, the "I'm really a pretty good guy" memoir. Or maybe it's the ain't my fault bitchez memoir. Either way, it's all for freedom! As you might suspect, Donald Rumsfeld has much to say about Guant?namo Bay, Abu Ghraib and the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.

Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points, Allen Iverson added 28 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Kevin Garnett , holding on for a 124-118 victory over the Dee Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams, Allen Iverson said. "We have enough talent to scare some people, but we just have to bring it night in and night out." The Nuggets even beat the Celtics at full strength-- kind of.

Because Chrysler lost money last year, it did not have to pay anything extra to its plant workers, but that would have been inexcusable, Chrysler's chief executive, Sergio Marchionne , said in a conference call. Kobe Bryant managed just 18 points while committing six turnovers in 41 minutes. "I don't approach the game like it's Kobe Bryant , and I want to have a Robert Horry game against him," Allen Iverson said. I want to play a good game against everybody. When you play well against another great player, it's only natural for you to feel good about the win. But that's not the most important thing for me. Mr Eric Schmidt said his new role would concentrate on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . Mr Sergey Brin will devote his time to "strategic projects" , particularly developing new products. "Our coalition's proposal is simple but would save thousands of lives," said coalition co-founder Mayor Thomas Menino . We have to keep guns out of the hands of dangerous people by fixing our gun check system and assuring that it applies to every gun sale. But to accomplish that goal we need leadership at every level. I thank Senator John Kerry for his leadership here in Massachusetts and urge Barack Obama in his speech on the State of the Union to stand up for the families and victims of gun violence every day. By Michael Vick A. Lough FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga.- Ovie Mughelli sat on the stool in front of his locker at Atlanta's practice facility, about 45 minutes from downtown, and shook his head. I can't even turn on the TV without somebody saying that we're going to be the underdog, the Atlanta Falcons fullback said. "What, 13-3 underdogs every single week?
